credit_line: Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt
title: Design for Embroidery for a Man's Waistcoat, for the Fabrique de St. Ruf
medium: Brush and gouache, graphite on paper
description: Left bottom corner with obliquely rising bottom edge.  Peacock feathers and leaf scrolls alternate along the outer edges.  Obliquely disposed strips with flowers in the field.
name: Drawing
